description_en: Transactional records of residential property sales from 2021 to the present. The table below provides a preview of the full dataset, which contains tens of thousands of transactions per year.
description_ms: Rekod transaksi harta tanah kediaman dari 2021 sehingga kini. Jadual di bawah memberi pratonton kepada dataset penuh yang mengandungi berpuluh ribu transaksi bagi setiap tahun.
methodology_en: This dataset is compiled based on transactional property data provided by public and private-sector property developers to the National Property Information Centre (NAPIC). The data is collected and compiled in accordance with NAPIC's mandate, which is to provide accurate, comprehensive and timely information on the demand and supply of the property market in Malaysia.
methodology_ms: Data ini dihasilkan daripada data transaksi harta tanah yang dibekalkan oleh pemaju hartanah sektor awam dan swasta kepada Pusat Maklumat Harta Tanah Negara (NAPIC). Data tersebut dirangka selaras dengan mandat NAPIC, iaitu untuk menyediakan maklumat yang tepat, komprehensif dan menepati masa berkaitan dengan permintaan dan penawaran pasaran harta tanah dalam negara.
caveat_en: This data may be updated or revised in future releases.
caveat_ms: Data ini mungkin disemak semula dalam penerbitan akan datang.

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date of the transaction in YYYY-MM-DD format, with DD set to 01 to avoid divulging the exact date of the transaction.
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh transaksi dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan DD diberi nilai 01 untuk elak daripada mendedahkan tarikh transaksi sepenuhnya.

fields.name: state
fields.description_en: [String] The state in which the property is located.
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Negeri di mana harta tanah berada.

fields.name: district
fields.description_en: [String] The district in which the property is located.
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Daerah di mana harta tanah berada.

fields.name: mukim
fields.description_en: [String] The mukim (sub-district) in which the property is located.
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Mukim di mana harta tanah berada.

fields.name: scheme
fields.description_en: [String] The housing scheme or development where the property is located.
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Skim perumahan atau pembangunan di mana harta tanah berada.

fields.name: road
fields.description_en: [String] The road or street where the property is located.
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Jalan di mana harta tanah berada.

fields.name: type
fields.description_en: [String] The type of residential property, such as terrace, semi-detached, condominium etc.
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Jenis harta tanah kediaman, seperti teres, berkembar, kondominium dll.

fields.name: land_area
fields.description_en: [Float] The land area of the property in square feet.
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Keluasan tanah harta tanah dalam kaki persegi.

fields.name: floor_area
fields.description_en: [Float] The floor area of the property in square feet.
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Keluasan lantai harta tanah dalam kaki persegi.

fields.name: level
fields.description_en: [Integer] The floor level for strata properties.

fields.name: strata
fields.description_en: [String] Whether the property is strata or non-strata titled.
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Sama ada harta tanah berhakmilik strata atau tidak.

fields.name: tenure
fields.description_en: [String] The land tenure type (freehold or leasehold).
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Jenis pegangan tanah (pegangan bebas atau pajakan).

fields.name: price
fields.description_en: [Float] The transaction price of the property in Malaysian Ringgit.
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Harga transaksi harta tanah dalam Ringgit Malaysia.
